Who would’ve thunk it… Finding a great shirt - a great clothing item on Amazon! I was obviously hesitant to buy a clothing item on Amazon, but damn… who knew?! Was I pleasantly surprised when I received this shirt! First, I loved the retro look to it as it reminded me of shirts my father wore when I was a kid a long time ago. And second, I loved the heavier weight to this shirt… allowing you to wear a thin t-shirt or tank underneath. I’m impressed and happy with my first designer-style shirt that I’ve ever purchased from Amazon… and obviously from an outsourced vendor for them.

I recently purchased several Paul Jones Knit Shirts and have learned to inspect them closely upon arrival. Out of the last six that I have purchased, I've returned two. This particular shirt arrived with snagged/pulled threads. The other was at least 1" shorter/smaller all the way around. When purchasing I followed the size chart (chest) and recommend purchasing one size larger. I'm also not going to risk shrinkage and will be bringing them to the drycleaners.

评论详情: I love everything about this vintage shirt. It looks good, feels pretty decent quality-wise, and it simple makes me feel cool wearing it! This isn't a piece that I'll be throwing in the dryer because of this. Time will tell how it holds up, but for now it's a lovely shirt.  For sizing, I went up a size because I was worried about my usual size being too snug (and potential shrinking). I'm very happy that I sized up because I think it fits me pretty well.
